game.name: Worms Revolution - Customization Pack
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Shared/Split Screen, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Stand out from the crowd in Worms Revolution with the Customisation Pack.Customisation Pack Includes Exclusive new theme - The Junkyard. 5 new lethal physics objects - Car Battery, Pliers, Toxic Canister, Hot Air Gun & Anti-Freeze. 7 new hats - Bandana, Gear Stick, Tyre, Afro, Flat Cap, Rapper Hat &
